summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the electric system of The City of Seattle; authorizing the issuance and sale of municipal light and power refunding revenue bonds for the purposes of paying the costs of refunding all or a portion of the City's outstanding municipal light and power revenue bonds and paying the costs of issuing and selling the bonds authorized herein; providing for the terms, conditions, covenants and manner of sale of those bonds; and describing the lien of those bonds.
